1.title: Before I Forget
1.plot: Belle returns from rehab to work a homicide case with Monica. Harry and Ronnie must help find a missing child during Bike Week in Wildwood. The new medical examiner, Dr. Andre Baines, has an unexpected first day on the job.

2.title: Who Are You?
2.plot: Ronnie and Tony respond to a disturbance by a mentally unstable man named Jake Wainwright. Dr. Baines's analysis on the "zombie" may lead to a deadly viral outbreak. Belle finally turns up a suspect in the child murder case.

3.title: Little Lies
3.plot: When the remains of James Riddick turn up, the FBI launches an investigation into Thomas's department, looking for the killer. An old nemesis of Belle and John, Agent Mike Franco (Anthony Plata), returns to lead the inquiry. Meanwhile, Ronnie finally has a suspect for the child killings.

4.title: Killing in the Name Of
4.plot: The truth is finally revealed. The conspiracy not only encompasses the events from this season, but the entire history of The System. After hearing the truth, nothing will ever be the same. A line between good and evil is drawn. The question remains, who will end up on each side?

5.title: What I've Done
5.plot: Tony confesses to the murder of James Riddick. The department investigates the murder of Captain Thomas. Belle and Monica are called to the scene of an apparent truck robbery.

6.title: Sympathy for the Devil
6.plot: The team is called to a grotesque homicide at North Wildwood University. DeAngelis begins a background check on Monica, while trying to survive his first day as Captain. Harry begins his own inquiry into Belle's connection to Thomas's death.

7.title: Sweet Sacrifice
7.plot: A suspect is murdered inside the Wildwood Police Department. Belle joins forces with Agent Autumn Reeves from the FBI to catch a pseudo-Satanic serial killer. Tensions begin to arise between Dr. Eriksson and General Wyatt.

8.title: Better of Two Evils
8.plot: With the man behind the Heaven's Night killings in custody, the team tries to link him to the leader of the cult, Mercer King. Belle and Monica's interrogation tactics finally cross the line. Harry contacts an old nemesis to find out information on Belle's past.

9.title: Fade to Black
9.plot: In the gripping finale, Chimera releases their virus inside the Wildwood Police Department. What few survivors remain must find a way to trust each other and stop the virus from being unleashed on the world.

1.title: Only in Wildwood
1.plot: Follow a group of quirky, moral ambiguous, and borderline psychopathic police officers that keep the city of Wildwood, NJ safe from murderers, cults, bombings, serial killers, snipers, drug cartels, terrorists, government conspiracies, and other untold dangers.

2.title: Not What It Looks Like
2.plot: The entire precinct is called in when four civilians and a police officer are gunned down in a coffee shop. Evidence points to the Wildwood Diablos, the biggest street gang in Wildwood. But not everything is as it seems.

3.title: Payback
3.plot: The search for Jenny Parker continues. Belle uses some unorthodox interrogation methods as well as uncovers a scandalous secret of Megan's.

4.title: Dem Bones
4.plot: Valery must exert her former career as an anthropologist when several human skeletons turn up in the woods.

5.title: Stockholm Syndrome
5.plot: Jane gets her personal life mixed up with work when Daren publishes a story on the serial killer case. Valery begins being stalked by an unknown caller with a restricted number.

6.title: Stakeout
6.plot: After Jane is kidnapped by John Dempsey, the entire precinct is on a stakeout leading to emotional train-wrecks between Valery and Tim, Harry and Maddy, Alyssa and Tony, and Belle and Megan.

7.title: Officer Down
7.plot: As the team races to save Jane from captivity, they also must cope with the death of one of their own.

1.title: Happy Valentine's Day
1.plot: The key witness to a murder case's body washes up at The Wharf. A person from Valery's past comes back to haunt her on Valentine's Day.

2.title: Protect and Serve
2.plot: Valery confronts her stalker, James Riddick, which leads to an unexpected result. The Serena Carpenter Murder Case continues and leads to dispute regarding the death penalty. Harry must make a presentation to the Police Chief Sinclair whom suffers from severe OCD.

3.title: Caught on Tape
3.plot: Thomas gets shocking news from his wife. Belle's addiction impacts his health. Richie Marquette is found murdered.

4.title: The Wildwood Police Department Bombing
4.plot: The entire precinct is destroyed in what appears to be a bombing. Some of the team will not survive.

5.title: The Morning After
5.plot: The precinct recovers from the explosion. Alyssa and Dr. Blade are rushed to the hospital but only one of them will survive. Harry and Tony investigate the cause of the explosion. Valery and Belle discover the body of someone they knew.

6.title: Fallout
6.plot: While the team recovers from the explosion, Tony and Harry search for the cause.

7.title: Who Shot Who?
7.plot: Belle refuses to take Jenny off of life support. Alyssa returns to work after the surgery and must deal with Tony after their kiss. The rest of the team investigates a triple homicide where an entire family is killed and the youngest son, Dan Harrison, is now missing.

8.title: The File
8.plot: The secrets being kept between officers within the department begin to come out. The man behind the gas leak is arrested but the team continues searching for whom mailed Tim the firebomb.

9.title: Unusual Suspect
9.plot: Valery is arrested by Tony for the Tangiers Cafe shooting. Belle and the rest of the team race to clear Valery's name. Tony deals with the outcome of his decision to arrest Valery.

10.title: For Valery
10.plot: Belle has 24 hours to prove Valery's innocence. Tony's actions cause traumatic events in his relationship with Alyssa.

11.title: Media
11.plot: Dan Harrison is finally apprehended but after Tony performs a bad search, the interrogation turns tragic. Two people finally get together in an unplanned way. One officer will have to say goodbye, forever.

1.title: One Way Street
1.plot: The entire team tries to find Valery while holding James Riddick for questioning. Shocking events occur in Maddy and Harry's relationship.

2.title: Last Dance
2.plot: A new CSI Jackie Parker arrives to finish the Valery Roscoe case. Tragedy occurs for Megan when Hector Santos is found shot to death inside his home.

3.title: Vigilante
3.plot: A rogue cop goes vigilante in Wildwood. Belle and Megan prepare for the Dan Harrison trial. Tom has trouble adjusting to Nikki's new job when she is promoted to Sergeant.

4.title: Bittersweet
4.plot: The team is shocked to learn the identity of the vigilante killer is one of their own. Tension develop in the love triangle of Harry, Alyssa, and Tony. Maddy has news concerning her maternity leave.

5.title: Internal Affairs
5.plot: The entire precinct is put under the microscope with Adam being arrested for murder and Captain Andrews is pulled over for DUI.

6.title: On the Job
6.plot: When Officer Udris announces his resignation, Belle and Harry decide to take him out to lunch where they remember what Udris meant to the department.

7.title: Bombs Away
7.plot: The entire department is working to find out who helped James Riddick escape from prison and what his plans are. One member of the team will not survive.

8.title: Requiem
8.plot: Harry and the rest of the team struggle to find James Riddick in the midst of the death of one of their own. Belle is shocked to find Monica has returned as a Private Investigator and was hired to spy on the team.

9.title: When I Cry
9.plot: The team finally figures out who James Riddick is working with and what his plans are to find Valery. In the end, the entire precinct finds only tragedy and death.

1.title: The Hand That Feeds
1.plot: After the Wildwood Police Station is attacked by armed gunmen, Harry is among the survivors who attempt to remain alive during the siege. Meanwhile, the team continues to be manipulated by serial bomber James Riddick, and forced to play his games. With Valery's life hanging in the balance, everyone has no choice but to play by James's rules.

2.title: Tik Tok
2.plot: The team believes that Valery is alive, but she is still being held captive by James Riddick. While they race to save her, Tony must come to terms with a life-changing decision.

3.title: One Way or Another
3.plot: Tony and Belle finally locate Valery, but it is now a race against the clock to save her before James Riddick's bomb detonates. Harry and Monica continue to try and crack the pass code.

4.title: Telephone
4.plot: Four months have passed since Alex Belle resigned from the force, but he is tracked down by his old partner from Philadelphia, John DeAngelis, who is now the new lieutenant and wanted Belle back on the force. Meanwhile, Harry gets a surprising new partner and works the homicide of a cable repair man who was beaten to death with a telephone.

5.title: I Feel the Earth Move
5.plot: Harry attempts to get use to his new work environment and new co-workers in time for Wildwood to be rocked by an unexpected earthquake. (Based off of the actual event which occurred in 2012)

6.title: Rock You Like a Hurricane
6.plot: The city of Wildwood is caught up in Hurricane Irene which devastates the police department. Lt. DeAngelis and his team chose to stay behind and ride out the storm, which pits everyone against each other and new secrets are revealed.

7.title: Marry Me
7.plot: Under the supervision (and funding) of Monica, repairs on the station begin with Tony acting as the lead contractor. While the rest of the team struggles to work while the building is under construction, internet conspiracy theorist Randy Swanson returns, proclaiming his innocence.

8.title: Empty Walls
8.plot: While doing construction on the station, Tony inadvertently uncovers a dark secret hidden behind the walls of the precinct. Meanwhile, Harry has a both major announcement and a near death experience.

9.title: The Downward Spiral
9.plot: In this one-hour special episode, we travel with Belle as he hits rock bottom of his personal issues. And as he will soon find out, these "issues" are not just his alcoholism or drug addiction, but some much deeper ones as well.

10.title: The Fragile
10.plot: Belle contemplates suicide after hitting rock bottom with his addiction and personal struggles. Meanwhile, Ronnie is wrapped up in a 100-year-old homicide despite being ordered off the case by her superiors and Tony attempts to get his job back.

imdb.plot outline: Chimera, a bio-terrorist group, was developing a bioweapon known as the Encephalic Plague. The group has three "heads" much like the creature from which it is named. Chimera is led by General Marcellus Wyatt, head of a private military contractor known as Virtus International, and Dr. Joseph Eriksson, CEO of the pharmaceutical corporation BioTech. The third head was Monica Haggarty, a Navy Medic kidnapped and brainwashed during the Bosnia-Herzegovina intervention in 1995. Monica was eventually rescued by government agents, and joined a secret organization known as "The Agency", with the task of stopping Chimera from carrying out its plan. Nine candidates were selected all around the country with the intention of recruiting each of them to The Agency. Monica and her partner, Agent Victoria Malatesta, were in charge of the candidates. Through manipulation, all nine candidates ended up working for the same police department in Miami, Florida. It was revealed that Victoria was working for Chimera all along and implanted their own spy into the department, a top rate assassin named Collen Thomas, who replaced Monica as the third head of Chimera. For years Monica and Thomas played a game of chess with the nine candidates as chess pieces, even later relocating them to Wildwood, New Jersey, the location of Chimera's headquarters. By 2013 only two candidates had survived, Alex Belle and Harry Glasses. Together with Belle's former mentor, John DeAngelis, they managed to stop Chimera's plan and destroy the entire operation.
imdb.title: The System
plot: Chimera, a bio-terrorist group, was developing a bioweapon known as the Encephalic Plague. The group has three "heads" much like the creature from which it is named. Chimera is led by General Marcellus Wyatt, head of a private military contractor known as Virtus International, and Dr. Joseph Eriksson, CEO of the pharmaceutical corporation BioTech. The third head was Monica Haggarty, a Navy Medic kidnapped and brainwashed during the Bosnia-Herzegovina intervention in 1995. Monica was eventually rescued by government agents, and joined a secret organization known as "The Agency", with the task of stopping Chimera from carrying out its plan. Nine candidates were selected all around the country with the intention of recruiting each of them to The Agency. Monica and her partner, Agent Victoria Malatesta, were in charge of the candidates. Through manipulation, all nine candidates ended up working for the same police department in Miami, Florida. It was revealed that Victoria was working for Chimera all along and implanted their own spy into the department, a top rate assassin named Collen Thomas, who replaced Monica as the third head of Chimera. For years Monica and Thomas played a game of chess with the nine candidates as chess pieces, even later relocating them to Wildwood, New Jersey, the location of Chimera's headquarters. By 2013 only two candidates had survived, Alex Belle and Harry Glasses. Together with Belle's former mentor, John DeAngelis, they managed to stop Chimera's plan and destroy the entire operation.::Dustin Detore
